task.title: Creating dynamic reporting tables
task.shortdesc: Dynamic reporting tables display real-time throughput information.

step.cmd: To create a dynamic table, click Table.

info.p: For advanced table management, use the whole toolbar.

step.cmd: Enter a name and description for the table.

substep.cmd: In the "Time out" field, enter the number of units.
Set additional control parameters using hostlimits command.

step.cmd: (Optional) Set a unique-by option. Then, click Add.
(Optional) Set target(s) for the table (which nodes this table is available for).

info.p: If no targets are set, then the classifier is available for all elements on all nodes.

taskbody.result: You can now publish the table.
